name: Funtionalities for Alpus theme
author: AlpusTheme

sections.description:
Overview

This plugin adds plenty of premium functionalities to Alpus theme, such as elementor page builder elements, header builder elements, and theme options to extend the functionality of that theme.

Demo on Alpus Theme | Documentation | Video tutorials | Support forum

Features

  • Elementor Page builder support (18 Exclusive Elements)
  • WooCommerce plugin support (8 Exclusive Elements)
  • Custom CSS and Javascript fields
  • Header builder support (Side header, Transparent header)
  • Mega Menu
  • Menu Skins
  • Adding widget area
  • Fully Responsive

HERE ARE A FEW REASONS WHY THEY LOVE Alpus –

Faster Performance – As a speed and performance focused framework, Alpus allows you to build websites that load faster and perform better.

Fill Site Editing – With all the settings and layouts managed through the Templates builder, Alpus keeps it simple and gives you lots of customizabilities with few click without coding knowledge.

Pixel Perfect Design – Using Alpus, you can make pixel-perfect, ready-to-use websites for free

Some demo sites by Alpus theme

  • Main
  • Corporate
  • Business Consulting
  • Fashion
  • Food Store
  • Environmental NGO
  • Furiture Store
  • Financial Services
  • Tea Shop
  • Kids Store

Compatible Browsers

  • Firefox
  • Safari
  • Opera
  • Chrome
  • iOS browser
  • Android browser

Documentations

If you have any question about working with “Alpus Core”, you can take a look at online documentations

Translation

You can start translating this plugin from here: online translation service.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6 or greater
  • PHP version 5.3.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This plugin works the best in Alpus Theme

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of Alpus Core, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Alpus Core” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download alpus-core.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select alpus-core.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download alpus-core.zip
  2. Extract the alpus-core directory to your computer
  3. Upload the alpus-core directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.

Updating

You can use automatic update to update the plugin safely.
sections.faq:
Will Alpus Core work with my theme?

No, Alpus Core only works on Alpus Theme

Where can I report bugs?

Bugs can be reported in our support forums.
sections.changelog:
V0.2.0
– Added: Elementor 3.18.3 Compatibility
– Added: WooCommerce 8.5.1 Compatibility
– Updated: Plugin Framework of Alpus

v0.1.0
– Initial release
